game.s_dis: Doodle Baseball is a fun Google Doodle game where players bat as food characters against peanuts in a Fourth of July celebration.
game.l_dis:
Doodle Baseball – Google’s Fourth of July Classic

Doodle Baseball is an interactive baseball mini-game released by Google as part of the 2019 Fourth of July celebration. In this quirky game, players step up to the plate as food characters such as hot dogs, hamburgers, and soda cans, while the opposing team is made up of mischievous peanuts.

What is Doodle Baseball?

Doodle Baseball is a lighthearted sports game that celebrates America’s pastime with a playful twist. The objective is simple: hit pitches by clicking at the right moment and try to score as many runs as possible before striking out.

How to Play Doodle Baseball?

  • Wait for the peanut pitcher to throw the ball.
  • Click or tap at the right time to swing your bat.
  • Try to hit home runs for maximum points!
  • Keep batting until you get three outs.

Why Play Doodle Baseball Unblocked?

Doodle Baseball Unblocked lets you enjoy this classic Google Doodle game anywhere, including on school or work networks where games are usually restricted. Perfect for quick, fun sessions during breaks.

Key Features

  • Food-Themed Characters: Play as hot dogs, burgers, and other tasty icons.
  • Easy Controls: Just click or tap to swing.
  • Endless Fun: Keep batting until you strike out.
  • Nostalgic Google Doodle: Part of the 2019 Fourth of July event.
  • Accessible Anywhere: Play instantly without downloads.

Step Up to the Plate ⚾

Doodle Baseball is simple yet addictive. Whether you’re a baseball fan or just looking for a fun distraction, this Doodle game is a home run!
